about.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building scalable web applications. Currently pursuing Computer Science at K.I.E.T Group of Institutions with hands-on experience in Django, React, and modern web technologies.
focus: Building scalable RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework
Creating responsive and intuitive user interfaces with React and Next.js
Optimizing application performance and database queries

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.description: Worked on multiple full-stack projects focused on building scalable RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework. Integrated cloud services and optimized application performance.

Integrated Azure Email Services and Azure Communication Services for 100% automated notifications
Diagnosed and resolved production bugs, reducing downtime by 15%
Optimized database schema and queries, improving API performance by 20%

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern

Collaborated with 6+ team members to maintain production-level apps
